RumorFact.Text: Below the Dead Lake, there is a strange sea dotted with a few islands. Next to the elevator that took me down is a levitating radio dish pointing north.

ExploreFact.Text: There is a raft on the starting island. Its controls appear to react to light.

RumorFact.Text: North of the starting island, there is a shrine of some kind on elevated ground. The stairs to the shrine have long crumbled.

ExploreFact.Text: The shrine has a secret entrance via a tunnel in the water.
There seems to be some kind of makeshift communications station in the shrine. There is a lever and a levitating radio dish pointing towards the entrance.
The lever opened a door in the hangar at the Dead Lake.

There is a mural in the shrine recounting a war between two factions, conveyed with red against blue inhabitants. This war lead to most of the planet becoming uninhabitable. Seeing this, the leaders of the two factions agreed to a truce and began to rebuild.
A poster above the communications area displays blue inhabitants flying ships into space and slowly building a much larger ship.

RumorFact.Text: South of the starting island, there is a large landmass. It contains a tunnel.

ExploreFact.Text: After going through the tunnel, I emerged at the surface. There is a gazebo with a mural on it. The mural seems to point out a tunnel below the water under a shrine.
